emerge MailTools

download http://sourceforge.net/projects/wemboss/files/wEMBOSS/2.2.1/wEMBOSSDIST-2.2.1.tar.gz to /opt 

cd /opt
tar xzvf wEMBOSSDIST-2.2.1.tar.gz
cd wEMBOSSDIST-2.2.1
cd wEMBOSSinstall
lisez INSTALL
lancez: perl install.pl

et répondez aux questions comme suit:
/usr/local/share/EMBOSS
/usr/local/bin
apache
/var/www/localhost/htdocs
localhost
80
/opt/wemboss
"moi"@localhost
Modifications à effectuer dans le fichier /etc/apache2/vhosts.d/default_vhost.include
ScriptAlias /wEMBOSS_cgi/ "/opt/wemboss/wEMBOSS_cgi/"


<Directory "/opt/wemboss/wEMBOSS_cgi">
        AllowOverride None
        Options None
        Order allow,deny
        Allow from all
        AuthType basic
        AuthUserFile "/etc/shadow"
        Authname "EMBOSS user"
        require valid-user
</Directory>

Et quelques commandes pour finir 

groupadd shadow
usermod -a -G shadow apache
chgrp shadow /etc/shadow
chmod 640 /etc/shadow
